data.comment: Mutley, you snickering, floppy eared hound.
80 days around the world, we’ll find a pot of gold just sitting where the rainbow’s ending. Time — we’ll fight against the time, and we’ll fly on the white wings of the wind.
Hey there where ya goin’, not exactly knowin’, who says you have to call just one place home. He’s goin’ everywhere, B.J. McKay and his best friend Bear.
Rollin’ down to Dallas, who’s providin’ my palace, off to New Orleans or who knows where. Places new and ladies, too, I’m B.J. McKay and this is my best friend Bear.
I never spend much time in school but I taught ladies plenty. It’s true I hire my body out for pay, hey hey.
Knight Rider, a shadowy flight into the dangerous world of a man who does not exist.
Soaring through all the galaxies. In search of Earth, flying in to the night.
